labs.title: Lab 100:  Overview of App in On-prem simulation
labs.description: Our DevOps manager shows the highlights of the application. TwitterFeed show (jsp).

labs.title: Lab 200:  Redeploy both Components to ACCS
labs.description: Deploy the JSP and WAR files to ACCS, show ability to scale app from 1 to 2 (or more) containers and discuss load-balancing.

labs.title: Lab 300:  Deploy to JCS
labs.description: ACCS in the simple deployment Target, but for some, JCS gives a more nuanced option with more configuration options.
